#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y <<  endl
#define N 100004
#define K 131

using namespace std;

vector<int>L[N];
int sons[N], n;

long long eval(int u, long long cant){
	
	if(u == -1)return 0;
	
	cant--;
	long long ans = cant * (cant - 1)/2;
	
	ans -= cant - int(L[u].size()) + 1;
	return ans;
}

long long solve(int u, int pd){
	
	long long ans = 0;
	sons[u] = 1;	
	
	for(int i = 0; i < L[u].size(); i++){
		
		int v = L[u][i];
		if(v == pd)continue;
		
		ans += solve(v, u);
		sons[u] += sons[v];
	}
	
	long long ac = n - sons[u] - 1, pair_sum = eval(pd, ac + 1);
	if(pd == -1)ac = 0;
	
	for(int i = 0; i < L[u].size(); i++){
		
		int v = L[u][i];
		if(v == pd)continue;
		
		pair_sum += (sons[v] - 1) * ac + eval(v, sons[v]);
		ac += sons[v] - 1;
		
	}
	
	ans += pair_sum;
	return ans;
}	

int main(){
	
	while(cin>>n){
		
		for(int i = 0; i <= n; i++)L[i].clear();
		memset(sons, 0, sizeof sons);
		
		int u, v;
		for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){
		
			scanf("%d%d", &u, &v);
			u--, v--;
			
			L[u].pb(v);
			L[v].pb(u);
		}
		
		long long ans = solve(0, -1);
		cout << ans/3 << endl;
	}

}
